entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Drumheller
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:55 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Drumheller 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: -9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -10.1°C
Wind: NNE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
